Apple_scab___Apple.management: Apply fungicides and remove fallen leaves.

Black_rot___Apple.management: Prune infected branches and use fungicides.

Cedar_apple_rust___Apple.management: Remove nearby junipers and use fungicides.

Powdery_mildew___Cherry_(including_sour).management: Use sulfur sprays and ensure good airflow.

Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_spot___Co.management: Use resistant hybrids and rotate crops.

Northern_Leaf_Blight___Corn_(maize).management: Plant resistant varieties and apply fungicides.

Black_rot___Grape.management: Prune infected vines and use fungicides.

Esca_(Black_Measles)___Grape.management: Remove infected vines and avoid pruning in wet conditions.

Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spot)___Gra.management: Improve air circulation and apply fungicides.

Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening)___Orange.management: Remove infected trees and control psyllids.

Bacterial_spot___Peach.management: Use copper sprays and disease-free seeds.

Bacterial_spot___Pepper,_bell.management: Use disease-free seeds and copper-based sprays.

Powdery_mildew___Squash.management: Use resistant varieties and apply fungicides.

Leaf_scorch___Strawberry.management: Remove infected leaves and avoid overhead watering.

Bacterial_spot___Tomato.management: Use copper-based sprays and disease-free seeds.

Late_blight___Tomato.management: Remove infected plants and apply fungicides.

Leaf_Mold___Tomato.management: Use resistant varieties, proper ventilation, and fungicides.

Septoria_leaf_spot___Tomato.management: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides.

Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider_mite___T.management: Use insecticidal soap and maintain humidity.

Target_Spot___Tomato.management: Use fungicides and remove affected leaves.

Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus___Tomato.management: Use resistant varieties and control whiteflies.

Tomato_mosaic_virus___Tomato.management: Remove infected plants and sanitize tools.
